content.prompt: The repetition of architectural elements in the Great Mosque at Córdoba, evident in the plan shown, indicates how the design could do which of the following as it was expanded over time?

choices.label: Guide visitors to follow a prescribed route through the chambers
Use sliding temporary walls to create an open and flexible interior
Separate secular from sacred space to promote an atmosphere for worship
Retain the spatial orientation and reinforce the spiritual purpose of the building
